# DevOps Pipeline

## Overview
This repository contains automation and configuration for a modern DevOps pipeline using GitHub Actions.

## Features
- Automated CI/CD workflows
- Infrastructure as Code (IaC) templates
- Container orchestration setup
- Monitoring and logging configuration

## Getting Started
1. Clone this repository
2. Review the workflows in `.github/workflows/`
3. Configure your environment variables
4. Deploy using the provided pipeline

## Documentation
Refer to individual workflow files for detailed instructions.
